it.polimi.ingsw.model.gamecomponents.cards

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.gamecomponents.cards.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseFightAction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PowerUp, Weapon

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements BaseFightAction
    Abstract class that is the base for both weapons and powerUps
    Author:
    Federico Inncente
